events.message: I have just filed a claim regarding a car accident that occurred yesterday afternoon. My vehicle was hit at an intersection by another car ignoring the stop sign.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident as the damage and incident details clearly involve a vehicle collision.
An agent specializing in auto claims has been assigned to handle the investigation and follow-up for this vehicle accident.
We have acknowledged receipt of your auto accident claim and will provide you with updates as we proceed with the evaluation.
Please submit all relevant documents including your police report, vehicle photos, and repair estimates to help assess your car accident claim.
The requested documents regarding the collision, such as the accident report and repair quotes, have been submitted successfully for review.
The investigation into the vehicle collision claim has commenced to verify the details and determine liability.
Our investigation into the accident has been completed, confirming your claim validity and the extent of the damages reported.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the repair costs and investigation findings for your auto accident claim.
We have received your feedback expressing satisfaction with the claim handling process and the proposed settlement offer.
Your auto accident claim has been officially approved and is now ready for the disbursement of funds for vehicle repairs.
The payment for your approved car accident claim has been issued to your bank account to cover the repair costs.
The claim related to your auto accident has been closed successfully after settlement and payment completion.
